ModulePrefs.title: Last Comments
ModulePrefs.description: Displays a list of up to 200 of the last comments left on your blog the way you want them to appear. Choose from author, comment preview, post title and more to link to and display. Mimic recent comments on other blogging sites or make your own style. New in version 1.2: Start the gadget with the comment list hidden to optimize blog space, and check for comments without having to refresh the entire blog.
ModulePrefs.author: Aratina Cage

UserPref.name: a
UserPref.display_name: SCROLL DOWN TO PREVIEW FOR HELP ============================= #1. Adjust gadget height automatically? ============================= SCROLL DOWN TO PREVIEW FOR HELP

UserPref.name: c
UserPref.display_name: #3. Number of characters per comment: (1-998; 999 for full comment; default: 160) =============================

UserPref.name: d
UserPref.display_name: ============================= #5. Enter your custom Display List: **leave blank to use default** =============================

UserPref.name: q
UserPref.display_name: #6. Enter image URL for separator bar background: (Do NOT enter 'http://') **leave blank to turn off** =============================

UserPref.name: t
UserPref.display_name: #9. Choose the color for text: **leave blank to use your blog skin color**

UserPref.name: l
UserPref.display_name: ============================= #10. Choose the color of links: **leave blank to use your blog skin color** =============================

UserPref.name: x
UserPref.display_name: #11. Enter text for buttons separated by | (pipe) like this: Show|Hide|Reload **leave blank to use default**

Module.Content:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xml:lang="en" lang="en">
<head>
<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=8" />
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=utf-8" />
<base target="_top" />
<style type="text/css">
body {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  font-color: #__UP_t__;
}
a:link, a:hover, a:visited {
  font-color: #__UP_l__;
}
a:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}
.LCMsg {
  font-size: __UP_o__%;
}
.LCNormalList, .LCFloatList {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  list-style-type: none;
}
.LCFloatList li {
  float: left;
  margin-right: 1em;
}
.LCNormalList li {
  float: none;
  margin-right: none;
}
.LCSection, .LCSectionBordered0, .LCSectionBordered1, .LCSectionBordered2, .LCSectionBordered3, .LCSectionBordered4, .LCSectionBordered5, .LCSectionBordered6, .LCSectionBordered7 {
  font-size: __UP_o__%;
  overflow: hidden;
}
.LCSection {
  margin-bottom: 0.8em;
}
.LCSectionBordered0, .LCSectionBordered1, .LCSectionBordered2, .LCSectionBordered3, .LCSectionBordered4, .LCSectionBordered5, .LCSectionBordered6, .LCSectionBordered7 {
  padding-top: 0.5em;
  padding-bottom: 0.5em;
  border-top-width: 1px;
  border-top-color: #__UP_r__;
}
.LCSectionBordered0 {
  border-top-style: dotted;
}
.LCSectionBordered1 {
  border-top-style: dashed;
}
.LCSectionBordered2 {
  border-top-style: solid;
}
.LCSectionBordered3 {
  border-top-style: double;
}
.LCSectionBordered4 {
  border-top-style: groove;
}
.LCSectionBordered5 {
  border-top-style: ridge;
}
.LCSectionBordered6 {
  border-top-style: inset;
}
.LCSectionBordered7 {
  border-top-style: outset;
}
.LCSectionBordered3, .LCSectionBordered4, .LCSectionBordered5, .LCSectionBordered6, .LCSectionBordered7 {
  border-top-width: 3px;
}
.LCSectionBordered0:first-child, .LCSectionBordered1:first-child, .LCSectionBordered2:first-child, .LCSectionBordered3:first-child, .LCSectionBordered4:first-child, .LCSectionBordered5:first-child, .LCSectionBordered6:first-child, .LCSectionBordered7:first-child {
  border-top: none;
}
.LCBlock {
  display: block;
  clear: both;
  margin-bottom: .2em;
  margin-right: 2px;
  margin-left: 2px;
}
.LCInline {
  display: inline;
  margin-bottom: 0;
}
.LCTypeS {
  font-size: 0;
  height: __UP_s__px;
  margin-bottom: 1px;
  margin-right: 0px;
  margin-left: 0px;
  background: #__UP_r__ url(http://__UP_q__) repeat scroll left top;
  opacity: 0.7;
  filter: alpha(opacity=70);
  border-top-right-radius: 5px;
  border-top-left-radius: 5px;
  -moz-border-radius-topleft: 5px;
  -moz-border-radius-topright: 5px;
}
.LCTypeI {
  float: left;
  margin: 3px 6px 0 0;
}
.LCTypeI img {
  border: 1px solid #__UP_r__;
  vertical-align: top;
}
.LCTypeA, .LCTypeC, .LCTypeD, .LCTypeI, .LCTypeL, .LCTypeP, .LCTypeT,
.LCTypeA a, .LCTypeC a, .LCTypeD a, .LCTypeI a, .LCTypeL a, .LCTypeP a, .LCTypeT a  {
  text-decoration: none;
}
.LCStyleNormal {
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: normal;
  font-variant: normal;
  text-decoration: none;
}
.LCStyleItalic {
  font-style: italic;
}
.LCStyleBold {
  font-weight: bold;
}
.LCStyleCaps {
  font-variant: small-caps;
}
.LCStyleUnderline, .LCStyleUnderline a {
  text-decoration: underline;
}
.LCStyleLarger {
  font-size: 109%;
}
.LCStyleSmaller {
  font-size: 91%;
}
.LCButtons {
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  font-size: __UP_o__%;
  padding: 1px 0;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: normal;
  font-variant: normal;
}
.LCButtons a, .LCButtons a:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
}
.LCButtons div {
  font-size: 90%;
  display: inline;
}
.LCLeftButton, .LCRightButton {
  border: 1px solid #000000;
}
.LCLeftButton, .LCRightButton {
  padding: 0 5px;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.LCLeftButton {
  margin-right: 0;
  border-top-left-radius: 10px;
  border-bottom-left-radius: 10px;
  -moz-border-radius-topleft: 10px;
  -moz-border-radius-bottomleft:10px;
}
.LCRightButton {
  margin-left: 0;
  border-top-right-radius: 10px;
  border-bottom-right-radius: 10px;
  -moz-border-radius-topright: 10px;
  -moz-border-radius-bottomright:10px;
}
.LCHelp {
  background: #FFFFFF;
  border: 5px double Gray;
  margin: 0 0 2em 0;
  padding: 3px;
}
.LCHelp h3 {
  text-align: center;
}
.LCHelp table {
  width: 100%;
  border-collapse: collapse;
  border: 5px solid Gray;
}
.LCHelp table thead tr th {
  text-decoration: underline;
}
.LCHelp table tbody tr th {
  font-family: monospace;
  font-weight: bold;
  background-color: #EEE;
  padding: 2px 5px;
}
.LCHelp table tbody tr td {
  font-style: italic;
  border-bottom: 5px double Gray;
  padding: 2px 5px;
}
</style>
</head>
<body>
